Airtank: As a matter of fact, we prefer flying on our own. By the way,
why =
take a shuttle when we can carry everyone?
   
>   ::Grimlock::
>

rimlock is standing by on the rescue party shuttle. He waits for
Doc and Wi=
ndlord and Perseus and whoever joins.

pens a comm to the Airtankers.

imlock's flying?
